core_tasks.scenario: It's midterm week. Your big exam for 'History of Magic Potions' is tomorrow morning.

responses.text: Pull an all-nighter with five energy drinks.
Review your notes, then get a good night's sleep.
Form a last-minute study group with friends.

core_tasks.scenario: The biggest party of the semester is tonight, but your group project presentation is due tomorrow.

responses.text: Go to the party! You can't miss this.
Try to do both: go for 'one hour' then work.
Skip the party and finish the project slides.

core_tasks.scenario: You've been invited to join the 'Genius Society', but their meetings conflict with your part-time job.

responses.text: Join the society. The connections are worth it.
Keep the job. You need the money.
Try to negotiate a solution with your boss.

core_tasks.scenario: Your academic advisor suggests an internship, but it's unpaid and across town.

responses.text: Take it. The experience is what matters.
Politely decline and look for a paid job.
Ask your advisor if they have any other leads.

side_tasks.scenario: Your roommate is... messy. Their side of the room is a biohazard.

responses.text: Confront them directly about it.
Just clean it up yourself. It's not worth the fight.
Start stacking their stuff in front of their door.

side_tasks.scenario: You're out of dining hall credits and it's 3 weeks 'til the semester ends.

responses.text: Survive on instant ramen and coffee.
Find an on-campus job at the dining hall.
'Visit' friends in other dorms around mealtime.

side_tasks.scenario: The club you joined wants you to hand out flyers in the freezing cold.

responses.text: Do it. It's for a good cause.
Pretend you're sick and stay in your warm bed.
Offer to manage the club's social media instead.

side_tasks.scenario: You see an interesting lecture on 'The Physics of Time Travel' happening right now.

responses.text: Go! This is why you're at college.
Check who the speaker is online first.
You'd rather take a nap.

side_tasks.scenario: A new coffee shop opened on campus offering free samples.

responses.text: Get in line! You need the caffeine.
Meet up with some friends there.
You're trying to save money, even 'free' is a trap.
